page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT (AND LIFE STYLES)
page.content: EMPLOYMENT. There are two main areas, those earning their living working on the farms, or in small industries connected with farming, producing slurry machines or working at Llandynog creamery,and those who commute to work in the towns of Ruthin, Denbigh, Mold and the City of Liverpool. LANGUAGE. The area is equally divided between those speaking Welsh, and the English speaking section. RELIGION. There is one church in the area at Llangynhafal, where the vicar is in charge of three parishes, with regular services, well attended. There is no chapel, but roughly half the population of the area attend the Welsh chapel at Llandyrnog.
